modmenu.descriptionTranslation.blockyfil: Use blocks to store files in the Minecraft world.
option.blockyfile.command.tooltip: Command for setting blocks. No ‘/’ prefix is needed.
option.blockyfile.forceCommand.tooltip: Force to use command to set blocks even in a single-player world.
option.blockyfile.palette.tooltip:
The palette used to represent file data.
Its length should be 2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64, 128, or 256.
commands.blockyfile.block_is_air_or_not_: Block is air or not exist: %s
argument.blockyfile.file.too_large: The file is too large (%d bytes), while the maximum allowed size is %d bytes.
